definition: very close or connected in space or time
details:
adjective
- very close or connected in space or time
= synonyms: contiguous
- having no intervening medium
= example: having no intervening medium
- performed with little or no delay
= example: performed with little or no delay
= synonyms: straightaway
- immediately before or after as in a chain of cause and effect
= example: immediately before or after as in a chain of cause and effect
- of the present time and place
= example: of the present time and place
